Text: Watch closely!
The aethers's flow...I see it!
Maintain distance, and then...
We must be patient!
The brute's far from bright...
Does he even know friend from foe?
If we must fight, can we get on with it?
Slow of wit yet heavy of hand...
Can we not just walk past it?
What am I watching?
It's...some manner of primal.

This is an abomination.
A perversion of people's faith!
Whatever this being is, we can't let it stand in our way!
Just another foe to vanquish.
My sentiments exactly.
Well, that victory felt...insubstantial.
Onwards to the upper floors!
We can't very well stay here, can we?
That was tiresome.
You fought well, Alisaie.
I was in good company.
It's like being in the belly of a beast...
What is it made of, I wonder?
How are we to rescue everyone?
This place sets my teeth on edge.
Best not to think on it for now.
They've been awfully busy taking prisoners...
We must find the heart of this tower...and shut it down.
I wonder how Y'shtola and the others fare.
What manner of creature are these things?
Aye, whatever it takes.

Just like in the picture...
We're facing the Magus Sisters!
A mockery of the Thavnairian gods!

She bars our path.
That's all we need to know.
So it's to be lance against lance, is it?
The same sisters the fisher lad told us about, yes?
Just a pale imitation of divinity, in the end.
Shall we push on?
What else can this tower throw at us?
Someone needed more training with the spear...
Protective of the tower, aren't they?
Compelled by Telophoroi magicks, I imagine.
I believe we've reached the summit.
The corruption...it feels stronger here.
The aether here is thick as syrup...

The talisman...
I feel it trembling.
Aye, the talisman trembles to resist it.
More warmachina to dismantle...
Just a little further!
Ugh, we're so close, and now this!
Rattling, clunking nuisances...
Stay focused! Now is not the time for mistakes!
The third and final sister, I hope?
I suppose we should have expected a third sister...
Cast down this false goddess and let us be done with it!
Would have been quicker to fight all three at once...
Alphinaud, get back!
Please don't tempt fate like that.

Wonderful.
I do so love guessing games.
Illusory magicks?

What─!?
Ugh, spare me...
The pixies subjected me to far worse...
My eyes are not so easily deceived.
A childish trick...but undeniably effective.
What nonsense is this?
It seems he is determined to protect Meteion.
Aye. A right bother this is going to be...
Let us make our way through the Frozen Sphere.
Ugh, of course there's a cold zone, and of course we're going through it...
Would that we didn't have to put down the creations...
Oh dear, this fellow seems disinclined to let us pass...
Then we have no choice but to force our way.
May you find peace in the aetherial sea...
Come, we mustn't tarry.
I'm afraid we can't do that.
Warn us all you like. We're coming regardless.
At least he has the courtesy to warn us.
He may have his flaws, but you can't fault his managerial prowess.
Seriously? You want to discuss his candidacy now?
Goodness me... What manner of thinking is behind this?
There truly is no accounting for taste...
A pass for constitution, but a fail for intelligence.
If its concept is submitted, I will be certain to reject it.
We're close. I can hear it in his voice.
We're taking Meteion! Whether you like it or not!
He's not going to give up, is he?
Enough is enough, Hermes!
Stubbornness can be a virtue, but this is a little excessive.
To protect Meteion, he would go so far as to transform...
So far as to make himself a villain...
A staff...
Footprints?
Did it flee?
No, it's still near!
There!
This wouldn't fool a child.
Hide shouldst thou wish...
But 'neath the light of the stars, all is laid bare!
Nice try, but your aether is still showing.
Is this...Vanish?
...No, it couldn't be.
A pathetic trick.
Yah!
An impressive concealment ability.
Shame about the telltale footprints.
Is it seriously trying to hide? From us?
Oh, please...
Oh?
That the power of ice could be used this way...
Alas, it's no use on us.
Vanished again... But again, it's left footprints.
If we smash everything, we're bound to hit something!
Gah! Where the hells are you!?
It's hidden itself better than before, I'll give it that.
But it's still not good enough.
If thou wouldst repeat thy trick...
Then thou wilt not object were I to do likewise.
Behold the puissance of Sharlayan astrology!
Hmph, haven't you learned anything?
If you would conceal yourself...
You really must learn to cover your tracks.
Let's flush it out!
A little shy, are we? Fine by me. I can wait.
Well, well, it's trying to confuse us.
But we won't be so easily confounded.
I've had enough of this mummer's farce.
Oho, how very creative.
I must say, this is a promising concept.
I wonder whose it is...
The way forward is clear.
If this is the test we must overcome, so be it.
What is She planning?
Such a high concentration of aether!
The elements in perfect alignment...
Whatever this is, we've but one choice.
To break the circle!
Exactly!
The suffering we've witnessed only strengthens our resolve!
By the Light, we shall!
Brace yourselves!
Ungh!
Aghhh!
Hmph!
Aaah!
It'll take...more than that!
This bodes ill!
Hers is the power to sunder worlds...
Oof... I'll feel that one tomorrow.
We're all standing, yes?
We are indeed.
For better or worse...
I've got plenty of fight left in me!
Aye.
All accounted for!
This was never like to be easy!
She's got more tricks up her sleeve than G'raha!
Well, pardon me for not measuring up to the God of Light!
She's quick...but not quick enough!
Oh, here She comes!
This is it! Forward!
Let me at them!
Quickly, but calmly...
The Telophoroi's reign ends this day!
Never thought I'd come back...
I shall bring up the rear.
Prisoners! Let's get them out of there!
Captives!
Let us entrust them to our comrades.
This is barbaric!
Here to be tempered, no doubt!

A hypertuned soldier, perhaps?
As for the other chap, who knows?
What's that supposed to be?
Moenbryda's dual haken...
An engineer and his creation, I presume.
A face only a mother could love...
He doth not appear to have been tempered.
Damn! The engineer got away!
After him!
Hardly seems worth chasing...
Is this the best they can muster?
He ran away?
Going up?
I feel the air rushing upwards...
So far, so good. Let's continue.
Even on the inside, this place has changed completely.
Just think what it took to build this ghastly place...
The perfect route...if one enjoys being ambushed...
There must be a way to reach the upper levels...
I sense danger afoot...
I know that feeling... The same as the Tower of Zot.
You sense it, too, yes?
Magitek... No, wait... That's something far worse.
I sense living aether... That is no mere machine.
Even the Allagans would balk at such devilry.
Pathetic creature.
Indeed. The aether of a living being.
Was he tempered?
A fitting end for one so depraved.
Let us not dwell on this grim episode. Onward.
He never stood a chance.
I'm inclined to agree.
What is this foul stench?
I sense great evil...all around us.
Have care, my friends!
We're heading in the right direction.
I must say, I'm not a fan of the décor.
And the aether here is positively vile.
Is that... Varis?
A primal...summoned by the Garleans themselves.
Tempered by their own Emperor...
As I suspected, each tower contained a piece of his corpse!
The cause of so much misery...
This fiend shall plague the world no longer!
Steady now. We can't afford any mistakes.
I can barely look at it...
Every fiber of my being is in revulsion...
All the horrors of Allag cannot compare...
No more games. This ends here.
Indeed. Let us expunge this blight once and for all!
Eyes forward!
Please, try to stay calm!
What is happening to their aether!?
We're here to aid you!
No time to waste!
I can't imagine what he must be going through...
Leave the jungle to us.
Understood. This way, everyone!
A sound plan.
Agreed. We head north!
Damn it! Too late...
There's no other way.
All we can offer is a swift death.
Let's get this over with...
There should be a village just ahead.
You shall suffer no more...
Forgive us...
Then let us hurry!
You do your part, and we shall do ours!
I see someone!
Pray take care!
Beasts in pursuit!
Did none survive?
If any yet live, we must save them!
The flames roar ever fiercer!
I can only pray some made it out alive...
Each beast more terrible than the last...
That fiend was once one of us...
I don't sense any aether!
No choice but to go through it.
Whoever they were, their suffering ends here.
Forward!
There are likely more ahead...
Unlike anything I've ever fought...
All too reminiscent of the sin eaters...
Keep heading north!
Gods be good... The sky...
The air above is thick with fiends!
A starshower...
Let Vrtra worry about the skies!
An all-too-familiar face...
The horror of Amaurot...
It can't be...
Over there, yes?
Aye. The beast of Amaurot...or something worse still.
What!?
I could learn a thing or two from Her!
So that's how it's done!
She's relentless!
Together, we'll overcome this!
Pray leave this to me!
Tupsimati!?
There's no mistaking that staff.
Art thou with us still, Papalymo?
This aether... Papalymo...
A soul's abiding care for companions held dear...
His will, given form.
Farewell again, my friend.
Thank you. Always.
Ne'er doth words suffice...
Try as you might to conceal it, you've always worried overmuch.
We understand. Rest well...
Don't fret about Lyse, either─she's just fine.
And here I thought we'd moved past this.
Her resentment is bigger than she was...
Stained by the blood of our comrades...
To think this is what remains of a life...
'Tis the very depravity she showed at the Waking Sands.
May you be cleansed by the tide.
Cling to any feeling so long and it's bound to turn dark...
Release thy passions. For thine own sake.
Well! That was harrowing.
That is quite enough!
Saving our hides once again?
That's Moenbryda's!
Thou ever grantest me the strength to move forward...
A dual haken?
She'll always be here for you.
Watch where it splits. Alisaie!
Way ahead of you!
Let's go!
Do you see that light?
This is our way forward.
Lord Haurchefant!
That shield!
The heraldry of House Fortemps...
A true knight, to thus aid a hero.
The people of Ishgard won't forget you.
Now keep his hope alive!
The light, it's...
Still holding to his principles in a way, I suppose.
Gaius no longer wishes this of you, Praefectus!
Regret for a duty unfulfilled...
Clinging to his orders even beyond death?
Maybe another sound thumping will convince him to let go.
Rest. Your fight is over.
You didn't fail him...
Return now to the star, that thy loyalty might serve better ends...
Lay down your arms...
That was but a shade. I'm sure the true Rhitahtyn has moved on.
This Light! Is it truly─
Look, the Crystal!
It has to be...
We knew you'd come.
Such a warm glow...
Indeed. It's her.
Showing us the way...once more.
Our Antecedent.
The truth lieth ahead.
I knew we would meet here.
I am truly honored.
She always was our lodestar.
Minfilia! I...
We'll make you proud.
Art thou content?
Our thanks, Minfilia, for being our guide.
I've always wanted to thank you. For saving our star.
I'm certain she knows.
We might have expected this, in retrospect.
Fandaniel's...soul?
Loss and grief beyond measure...
That mask... That of Allag's greatest mind.
It will take more than a bit of theater to frighten me.
Are those...denizens of this star?
Is this truly what Meteion and her sisters saw?
A most grievous malady hath stricken this star.
Ugh, that smell...
Aye, a most horrid calamity hath made a corpse of the star.
Gods, this is awful...
Such devastation... It defies belief.
Were all the stars she visited like this, I wonder?
To be fueled by hatred is no way to live.
They turned on each other, just like that?
To live only meant spreading this plague to others.
I'm not sure how much more I can stand to see.
'Twould seem this beast drinketh deep of pestilence...
It's as if the affliction warps their very bones.
I pity them.
Perhaps death would have been kinder...
Would that this were not merely a memory.
I think I've had my fill of this nightmare.
That any star should suffer such a fate...
Telling that Meteion recalls their suffering in such detail.
A hollow victory.
I know. We can but pray it found peace in the hereafter.
Has she thrown us into the middle of a war!?
This star was sundered by war, then?
Yet they saw not what they had wrought ere it consumed them...
Such wanton destruction...
A fate I pray never comes to pass on Etheirys.
Does she truly believe this is the fate of all peoples?
Surely, there were those who sought to end the bloodshed?
Not everyone would have abandoned hope. I know it...
Whatever freedom they found, I'm sure it was short-lived.
Or mayhap it was not freedom at all.
That's a big one.
We've come too far to back down now.
Was this meant to bring an end to the war?
They could have accomplished so much good with their knowledge...
Hmph. I've seen bigger.
I can see why you chose to lock the Crystal Tower.
That brings back memories I'd much rather forget.
Come on, we have to keep going!
Peace through exterminating its creators... “Peacekeeper,” indeed.
This is not at all what technology was meant for!
This could have been us, had we been unable to stop the war...
“Freedom through technology.” If not for that, we wouldn't be here.
This place is...beautiful.
Their end came not for want, but for the lack of it...
How could anyone despair in a world such as this?
This place feels strangely devoid of life...
Looks can deceive. This place is beautiful...but cold.
They should be here somewhere...
O-Oh my! They appear to be coming this way!
Run for the hills!
\<rustle> \<rustle> \<rustle>
\<rustle> \<rustle> \<rustle>
You shall not take the wind from our wings!
This poison...is too strong...
Ah! My aether wanes...!
The summoning must needs be completed!
We...have failed...
The parts I seek... So near, yet so far!
I'll have to search elsewhere.
We hunted high and low for these provisions.
Jotnar! They're closing in!
What a terrible waste...
Get back! Back, I say!
The provisions are safe! Thank you!
Bwaaaaaagh!
Graaah!
Significant damage to imperial capital detected. Initiating automated combat protocol.
Unidentified combatant detected. Commencing attack.
Glory...be...
For the Empire...
Is nowhere safe!?
...How!? How did it come to this!?
HeLp... PlEaSe...
Is my time not yet come?
Please, Ra-la, come back! I long for release!
Has my time come at last?
Please, I beg of you─end my suffering.
G-Guh-Garlemaaald...
F-F-For the...Empire...
Mwahaha... Oh, how I long for that sticky sensation!
Oh, I must needs get more of that marvelous goo...
Relinquish your aether!
Behold the genius of my design!
Slough off your accursed flesh!
My aether consume you!
There will be no quarter!
Blind them with your brilliance!
You will play your part...
Flee in terror!
Submit!
Begone!
Your end is nigh...
A keyward is to be obeyed!
I have been granted power untold!
Oh, thank you...
Free at last!
Can I finally go home?

They must be around here some─
There!
Oh my, there are quite a lot of them...

...Er, a little help?
These seedlings must be exterminated!
That takes care of that particular mess!
I don't suppose you're free to clean up another...?

Bother.
I was hoping we could contain the situation...
Argh!
\<cough> ...Ugh... \<wheeze>
This is unacceptable...
We'll never get her back to the cave without incident.
I'm afraid this specimen requires termination. If you please...?

Professor!
Professor Gilly!
We've had reports of a situation evolving in the Central Circuit!
Your presence is required immediately!
The specimen is no longer a threat. Excellent work!
What? What now!? I thought we had things under control!
Come along, then, Sathzant!
This is not going to look good on my review...
The reactor remains intact, thank the Scholar.
They seem drawn by the aetheric energy...

This experiment is over!
Shatter those crystal beasts!
That should do it.
But I should like to check on the other reactors.
Anyone willing to assist, come with me!

What a disaster...
I'll have to file a report.
I will not yield!
We will weather any storm!
The winds favor us!
You're in my sights!
Like an arrow from Llymlaen!
Pshhh! Brayflox feels ouchy...
You have my eternal gratitude!
My friends will be thrilled and relieved in equal measure!
I'll accept anything you can find!
Hooray! Now, to return home and bathe in gooey bliss!
Mwahaha! That sticky slime must be mine!
Come one, come all! Step right up and punch me in the face!
Perpetrate violence to win fabulous prizes!
My suffering for your satisfaction!
Do not be shy! You cannot kill that which has no life!
No...? How disappointing.
Challengers? How wonderful!
Yes, yes! More blood and oil!
Harder! Harder! You want your prize, don't you?
Winner, winner, carrot dinner!
Better luck next time!
Test your strength for a chance at wondrous prizes!
Sate your thirst for blood and reap rich rewards!
I will hold nothing back, so give it your all!
